sense.gloss: to flash (e.g. lightning), to flicker, to glitter, to sparkle, to gleam
to flutter (e.g. flag), to wave, to undulate
to flash into one's mind (e.g. an idea), to come to one suddenly

sdata.j: ずば↑抜↑↓ぬ↓けた↑着想↑↓ちゃくそう↓というのは、↑往々↑↓おうおう↓にして↑天啓↑↓てんけい↓のごとく|ヒラメク|ようだ。
sdata.e: Sometimes the most inspired ideas seem to just come from out of the blue.
